title: Content Strategist
description:
ContentPeak Agency is Hiring a Content Strategist (Full-Time)

ContentPeak Agency, a Bangalore-based marketing firm, creates compelling content for clients in tech and education. We’re seeking an Content Strategist to craft engaging narratives.

Role Overview
You’ll develop content strategies to drive brand engagement across digital platforms.

Key Duties
- Create content strategies for blogs and social media.
- Collaborate with designers for visual content.
- Analyze performance with Google Analytics.
- Optimize SEO for content.
- Manage content calendars.
- Conduct audience research.
- Stay updated on content trends.
- Prepare client reports.
- Support client meetings.
- Contribute to thought leadership.

What We Need
Candidates should have 2–3 years of experience in content marketing, proficient in Google Analytics, SEMrush, and SEO tools. Strong writing and editing skills are essential, along with B2C content experience. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, journalism, or a related field is required.

Why ContentPeak?
We value storytelling and creativity. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we support growth with training and tools. You’ll work on diverse projects in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Provident fund
18 days of annual leave
Training budget
Content tools access
Team events

Join Us
Apply now to join ContentPeak Agency and tell impactful stories!
